movie.title: Pure Country
movie.description_intro: Dusty Chandler (Strait) is a super star in the country music world, but his shows have the style of a '70s rock concert. One day he takes a walk - out of his overdone concerts to find his real country roots. He's helped and hindered by friends and staff, but pushes on in his search for a real music style as well as a real romance.
movie.description_full: Dusty Chandler (Strait) is a super star in the country music world, but his shows have the style of a '70s rock concert. He's helped and hindered by friends and staff, but pushes on in his search for a real music style as well as a real romance.

movies.title: Lot in Sodom
movies.summary: Lot in Sodom is a sensual depiction of the Sodom and Gomorrah story filled with sinewy and semi-clad bodies, delirious bacchanales devoted to physical pleasure, and a searing, cataclysmic finale depicting the fall of a city devoted to sins of the flesh. Digitally mastered from excellent 35mm elements. Lot In Sodom has its original experimental soundtrack by Alec Wilder.

Digitally mastered from excellent 35mm elements. Lot In Sodom has its original experimental soundtrack by Alec Wilder.

movies.title: Huie's Sermon
movies.summary: The reverend Huie L. Rogers delivers an intense and impassioned sermon at his church in Brooklyn.
movies.description_full: The reverend Huie L. Rogers delivers an intense and impassioned sermon at his church in Brooklyn.
movies.synopsis: The reverend Huie L. Rogers delivers an intense and impassioned sermon at his church in Brooklyn.

movies.title: The Thing
movies.summary: A US research station, Antarctica, early-winter 1982. The base is suddenly buzzed by a helicopter from the nearby Norwegian research station. They are trying to kill a dog that has escaped from their base. After the destruction of the Norwegian chopper the members of the US team fly to the Norwegian base, only to discover them all dead or missing. They do find the remains of a strange creature the Norwegians burned. The Americans take it to their base and deduce that it is an alien life form. After a while it is apparent that the alien can take over and assimilate into other life forms, including humans, and can spread like a virus. This means that anyone at the base could be inhabited by The Thing, and tensions escalate.

movies.title: Painless
movies.summary: Henry Long desperately seeks a cure for the condition that leaves him unable to feel physical pain.
movies.description_full: Henry Long desperately seeks a cure for the condition that leaves him unable to feel physical pain.
